title: Web Development Bootcamp
about: Become a Full-Stack Web Developer with just ONE course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, MongoDB, Web3 and DApps
overview1: You will build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.
overview2: You will learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.
overview3: You will master both front and back-end development, becoming a full-stack developer by the end of the course.

title: React - The Complete Guide
about: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!
overview1: Build powerful, fast, user-friendly and reactive web apps
overview2: Provide amazing user experiences by leveraging the power of JavaScript with ease
overview3: Apply for high-paid jobs or work as a freelancer in one the most-demanded sectors you can find in web dev right now

title: Complete Python Programming Course
about: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!
overview3: Parse the Web and Create their own Games

title: Machine Learning
about: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts. Code templates included.
overview1: Master Machine Learning on Python & R
overview2: Have a great intuition of many Machine Learning models

title: Animation for Illustration
about: Jump into the world of animation with illustrator Libby VanderPloeg — using only Procreate and Photoshop!
overview1: Create your initial sketch with an eye toward animation
overview2: Use Procreate layers to plan movement and motion
overview3: Activate your animation in Photoshop with just a few clicks

title: Blockchain Programming
about: Build a blockchain and cryptocurrency from scratch using Python
overview1: Build a cryptocoin from scratch using Python
overview2: Digitally sign messages and verify signatures
overview3: Design and build a tamper-proof blockchain to store any kind of data

title: Linux Administration Bootcamp
about: Great for both beginners and advanced level, course prepares you for a Linux Administrator job.
overview1: realize the potential of the Linux command line.

title: Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D
about: Learn Unity in C# & Code Your First Five 2D Video Games for Web, Mac & PC. The Tutorials Cover Tilemap
overview1: Be challenged to build the entire game yourself.
overview2: Be shown step-by step how to build it.
overview3: Be challenged to apply, and re-apply your knowledge regularly.
